announcements.details: Read the commentary on the readings for the 6th Sunday in Ordinary Time.
announcements.title: Commentary: 6th Sunday in Ordinary Time

announcements.details: There will be ONE mass on Sunday, 22nd February, 2026. Offertory will be led by Legion of Mary and the Sunday borns. Prayer of the faithful will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: First Sunday of Lent

announcements.details: There is In His Presence on Sunday 22nd February at 6pm. Kindly come with your written intentions.
announcements.title: In His Presence

announcements.details: Registration for the Lenten Retreat continuous after Mass. Each participant is to pay a minimum commitment fee of 50 Ghana cedis
announcements.title: Lenten Retreat Registration

announcements.details: The church is seeking the services of a dedicated Physical Trainer. Anyone interested should kindly contact any of the church secretaries.
announcements.title: Vacancy: Physical Trainer

announcements.details: The St Bakhita Parish 2026 calendars are available for purchase. Any additional revenue generated beyond the cost from this year's sales will go directly into donations towards the needy
announcements.title: 2026 Calendar Sales

announcements.details: Effective January 2026, Stole fees for the celebration of the sacraments and church dues have been reviewed.
announcements.title: Revision of Stole Fees and Church Dues

events.details: Date: 14th March, 2026 | Venue: St Arnold Janssen Centre, Tuba
events.title: Lenten Retreat

masses.details: Stations of the Cross will be held in the church every Friday during Lent, immediately after the evening mass.
masses.subtitle: Friday at 7pm
masses.title: Stations of the Cross

masses.details: Rosary prayers begin 30 mins before mass
masses.subtitle: Saturday at 6:30am
masses.title: Saturday Morning Mass

sacraments.details: Kindly contact the church office to register for Infant Baptism
sacraments.subtitle: First Saturday of every month, after Grotto Mass
sacraments.title: Infant Baptism

sacraments.subtitle: The St Bakhita Marriage School commenced on the 19th of October, 2025.
sacraments.title: Marriage School

sacraments.subtitle: Adults: Sunday after first mass; Children: Saturdays at 3pm
sacraments.title: Catechism Classes

sacraments.subtitle: By appointment with the priest in charge.
